title: Apply for a New Business License
description: An entrepreneur is starting a new cafe and needs to apply for a city business license.

tasks.description: Gather information about the business, including name, address, type, and owner details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all required business information.

tasks.description: Identify any other required permits, such as a health permit for a cafe.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the applicant they will also need to apply for a health permit.

tasks.description: Process the business license application fee and issue a temporary license.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes payment and provides a temporary license pending final approval.
